**Government Tender Announcement**
# KAD10-230120: Purchase of a Droplet Digital PCR System

## Reference Information
* Reference Number: WS3601208840-Doc3607942846
* Solicitation Number: WS3601208840
* Publication Date: September 20, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 20, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT

## Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 7, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: November 8, 2023
* Regions of Delivery: Montréal, Québec, Canada

## Invitation to Tender
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of the Environment (ECCC) invites bids for the purchase of a droplet digital PCR system. All bids must be submitted electronically through Buyandsell by the new deadline of October 20, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

## Tender Description
The tender is for the acquisition of a droplet digital PCR system for use by the Department of the Environment (ECCC). The system must be located in Montréal, Québec, Canada. The tender is issued under the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Tender Evaluation
The lowest price bid submission will be the selected bidder. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to award the contract to the lowest priced responsive bid submission. The tender evaluation will be conducted in accordance with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) evaluation criteria.
